attributes.action: Immigration and Migrants should be cheked now in Britain (UK).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Immigration and Migrants should be cheked now, as Britain's population will soar by 24 Milillion if immigration remains unchecked and to Immigration meltdown.
As this will harm the quality of LIFE, as the UK will not be able to cope.
The EU is getting big and will be getting bigger soon - and will all the homes be built,as the UK is getting smaller and not bigger.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
